GapFillInput.Title: -ed / -ing adjectives
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type a word from the pool into the correct space.

Content.Question:
1. Rose was wearing the same dress as me. It was really embarrassing. I went bright red!
2. I’ve always been frightened of snakes.
3. The news was shocking. Three people were dead and more than twenty were injured.
4. Bruce was terribly disappointed that he didn’t get the job.
5. Lloyd told us a fascinating story about how he and Martha first met.
6. The advert said it was a horror film but I didn’t think it was very frightening.
7. We were shocked to hear about Ray’s car accident.
8. The book was very disappointing. It started well, but the ending was weak.
9. Kareem was embarrassed when his mother showed Lucy photographs of him when he was a baby.
10. My son’s twelve and he’s fascinated by spiders. He’s got about twenty different types in his bedroom.
